Press Release – Groundbreaking Ceremony for new RV Pavilion and Multi-Use Facility
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Posted on [April 25, 2025](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/uncategorized/press-release-groundbreaking-ceremony-for-new-rv-pavilion-and-multi-use-facility/)

[Press Release 4.25.2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/Press-Release-4.25.2025.pdf)

Mayor Maribel Guerrero and the Board of Aldermen of the Town of Rancho Viejo Announce a Groundbreaking Ceremony

Mayor Guerrero cordially invites all residents to the groundbreaking ceremony for the Town of Rancho Viejo’s  
new Pavilion and Multi-Use Facility.

Wednesday, April 30, 2025, at 5:30 PM  
at the Rancho Viejo Kids’ Park  
115 Angelitas Avenue  
Rancho Viejo, Texas
